item.title: [GRA7][WebPaaS] - Foundation upgrade to 3.22
item.description:
Sep 5, 07:12 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Sep 5, 00:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Aug 30, 09:34 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 05/09/2022 00:00 UTC
End time : 05/09/2022 06:00 UTC
Service impact : Our partner communicated to OVHcloud that the following informations :
o As for each Foundation upgrade, we'll recreate the whole region, meaning at some point we'll have almost twice the number of instances (the old in 3.21, the new ones in 3.22).
o All projects and environments will continue to function during the upgrade; however, at one point each project will be reallocated resulting in a short interruption. Integrations and webhooks may fail during the maintenance, it's also possible to notice increased deployment times.
o Projects provisioning should not be impacted.

item.title: [Global][MX Plan] - homez.572
item.description:
Aug 31, 15:11 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 31/08/2022 09:50 UTC
End Time : 31/08/2022 15:05 UTC
Current status : Resolved
Our technical teams resolved the issue. Impacted services are now operational.

Aug 31, 10:01 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 31/08/2022 09:50 UTC
Service impact : Mailboxes hosted on homez.572 are inaccessible. We observe the following symptoms:
Unable to check the mailbox
Unavailable access via webmail
Unable to send and receive mail.
Mails waiting to be received are queued
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are investigating to determine the origin of this degradation
